name: 2022 5th International Conference on Digital Medicine and Image Processing
content: Paper Publishing: 1\. ACM International Conference Proceedings (ISBN: 978-1-4503-9765-0), which will be archived in ACM Digital Library, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by CPCI. 2\. Journal of Image and Graphics (JOIG, ISSN: 2301-3699), included in Scopus, Google Scholar, Crossref, IndexCopernicus, etc.
